item.title: [FLINK-37693] ForSt fails to restore from reused checkpoint

item.summary: ForSt fails to restore from reused checkpoint

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: masteryhx  Thanks for reporting this. The problem arises because in this case ForSt cannot tell whether a file is an SST file or not from the file suffix, since the file name is in UUID format. Considering that a NOT_OWNED file must be an SST file, i agree that we can skip local access of NOT_OWNED files.
